C

checkCollision(Direction, Map) - Method in class demolition.GameObject
Checks whether a collision will occur if moved in the specified direction
checkContact() - Method in class demolition.Bomb
Checks explosion for any contact between the player or enemies.
checkKill() - Method in class demolition.BombGuy
Checks if BombGuy is on the same tile as an enemy and calls BombGuy.kill() if so
checkWin() - Method in class demolition.BombGuy
Checks whether BombGuy is on a GOAL tile

The recursive method that is executed upon collision with a wall.

The recursive method that is executed upon collision with a wall.
constructMap(String) - Method in class demolition.Map

D

demolition - package demolition
 
draw() - Method in class demolition.App
Called upon once every frame, ticks every object in the map then draws all objects in the game.
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Bomb
To be executed once every frame, draws the bomb
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.GameObject
To be executed once per frame, draws the GameObject using its current_sprite
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Map
Calls the draw() method for every object on the map
draw(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.Tile
 
draw(PApplet, int, int) - Method in class demolition.UI
Draws the timer, lives remaining and area above the map.
drawLose(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.UI
Draws the losing screen, displaying an orange background with "GAME OVER" text
drawWin(PApplet) - Method in class demolition.UI
Draws the win screen, displaying an orange background with "YOU WIN" text

K

keyPressed() - Method in class demolition.App
Called when a key is pressed and previous key released, moves player in direction of arrow key press, or places a bomb at players position if spacebar pressed
keyReleased() - Method in class demolition.App
Sets released to true, indicating previous key has been released so a App.keyPressed() will cause the player to move
kill() - Method in class demolition.BombGuy
Decrements the number of lives, and calls Map.resetLevel()

Map - Class in demolition
 
Map(String, int, int, PImage[], PImage[], PImage[][], PImage[][], PImage[][], PImage[][]) - Constructor for class demolition.Map
Map constructor, requires the path of the level file in which the map is immediately constructed, and all GameObjects loaded with.
move(Direction) - Method in class demolition.GameObject
Moves the GameObject in a cardinal direction, a distance of one grid space and updates its position in the map array (changing i_pos and j_pos)

R

Red - Class in demolition
 
Red(int, int, int, int, PImage[][], Map) - Constructor for class demolition.Red
Constructor for Red Enemy
Red_s - Variable in class demolition.Map
 
reset() - Method in class demolition.BombGuy
Calls GameObject.resetPos() and changes the sprite being drawn to the first sprite in the cycle array
reset() - Method in class demolition.Enemy
Resets the position of the enemy, and aligns the enemy's FPS timer (how many frames until the next second) with the map's FPS timer such that the enemies continue to move only at the start of every second
reset() - Method in class demolition.GameObject
Resets the position and sprite cycle of the GameObject
resetLevel() - Method in class demolition.Map
Resets the level, all dead enemies respawn and all objects move back to their original positions.
resetPos() - Method in class demolition.GameObject
moves GameObject back to original position

s_cycle - Variable in class demolition.GameObject
 
s_dir - Variable in class demolition.GameObject

Changes the path to the config file
setLives(int) - Method in class demolition.BombGuy
 
settings() - Method in class demolition.App
establishes the size of the PApplet window to be WIDTH (480) and HEIGHT (480)
setup() - Method in class demolition.App
Called to setup the applet, loads and stores all sprites, loads config file, creates new Map and new UI
sprite - Variable in class demolition.Tile
 
sprite_cycle() - Method in class demolition.Bomb
To be executed once every frame by Bomb.tick(), cycles the sprite by moving to the next PImage in the PImage[] array
sprite_cycle() - Method in class demolition.GameObject
To be executed once per frame, cycles the GameObject's current_sprite being rendered to the next sprite in the array
sprite_timer - Variable in class demolition.GameObject
 
sprites - Variable in class demolition.GameObject
 

T

tick() - Method in class demolition.Bomb
To be executed once every frame, decrements timers, calls Bomb.sprite_cycle() per execution and calls Bomb.explode() once exploded.
tick() - Method in class demolition.BombGuy
To be executed once every frame, calls GameObject.sprite_cycle() and BombGuy.checkKill()
tick() - Method in class demolition.Enemy
To be executed once every frame, calls GameObject.sprite_cycle() to cycle the sprite in the array and calls GameObject.move(Direction d) once every 60 frames
tick() - Method in class demolition.GameObject
To be executed once per frame
tick() - Method in class demolition.Map
To be executed once every frame, calls BombGuy.tick(), Map.tickBombs(), Map.tickTimer(), Map.tickEnemies() to call the tick method of every object on the map
tickBombs() - Method in class demolition.Map
Calls Bomb.tick() for every bomb on the map, if any of the bombs make contact with the player, Bomb.tick() returns true and method returns
tickEnemies() - Method in class demolition.Map
Calls Enemy.tick() for every enemy on the map
tickTimer() - Method in class demolition.Map
Decrements the fps timer every execution, if fps timer reaches 0, the real-time timer is decremented as a second has elapsed.
Tile - Class in demolition
 
Tile(PImage, TileType, int, int) - Constructor for class demolition.Tile
Constructor for a tile
type - Variable in class demolition.Tile
 

U

UI - Class in demolition
